channel.title: Lobsters Lobsters Lobsters!
channel.description:
Click on my user name and click lobster company then go to blogs
This is a Special Lobster fishing company And i need to hire people so if you want to join
Then Post on there

item.title: Lobsters Lobsters Lobsters!
item.dc:creator: @james james
item.description:
@james wrote:

[quote=“Rictoo, post:4, topic:8829”]I’d actually like to join, BUT 3 things:

  1. Your site SUCKS, please get a better layout, and get some php thing that handles the orders, not a fucking blog =/

  2. Do we get payed?

  3. Right now, you should organise the whole thing, like (THIS IS JUST AN EXAMPLE):
    –
    THIS IS WHAT WE SELL IT FOR:
    –
    1 Cooked Lobby = 10gp
    10 Cooked Lobbies = 95gp
    100 Cooked Lobbies = 900gp

–
Paying Procedure (To us):

1 Cooked Lobby = 9gp
10 Cooked Lobbies = 90gp
100 Cooked Lobbies =850gp

===
With that, you get a profit!

Now of course, don’t look at my example :P, I used fake prices =/[/quote]
at those prices i will buy a lot of lobbies

Read full topic

item.title: Lobsters Lobsters Lobsters!
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

I’d actually like to join, BUT 3 things:

  1. Your site SUCKS, please get a better layout, and get some php thing that handles the orders, not a fucking blog =/

  2. Do we get payed?

  3. Right now, you should organise the whole thing, like (THIS IS JUST AN EXAMPLE):
    –
    THIS IS WHAT WE SELL IT FOR:
    –
    1 Cooked Lobby = 10gp
    10 Cooked Lobbies = 95gp
    100 Cooked Lobbies = 900gp

–
Paying Procedure (To us):

1 Cooked Lobby = 9gp
10 Cooked Lobbies = 90gp
100 Cooked Lobbies =850gp

===
With that, you get a profit!

Now of course, don’t look at my example :P, I used fake prices =/

Read full topic
